description:
Clever Cloud provides an IT Automation platform which allows you to host your web applications.
Clever Tools allows you to manage your Clever Cloud applications and addons from the command line.

With Clever Tools, you can:

- create and deploy your applications
- manage domain names routing
- check logs
- provision databases
- manage notifications and webhooks

To get started, run `clever login` and create your first application with `clever create`.
summary: Command Line Interface for Clever Cloud
author: Clément Delafargue
